terminal_illness_benefits.value:
1. **Acceleration of Death Benefit**: The policy provides an acceleration of the death benefit upon diagnosis of specified terminal illnesses until the age of 80 years.
2. **Conditions for Terminal Illness**: A life assured is considered terminally ill if diagnosed with a condition likely to lead to death within 6 months, as confirmed by two independent medical practitioners. The insured must not be receiving treatment other than palliative medication for symptomatic relief.
3. **Impact on Policy**: 
   a) If the **Death Benefit** at the time of claim equals the **Terminal Illness benefit**, the policy will terminate.
   b) If the **Death Benefit** at the time of claim is greater than the **Terminal Illness benefit**, the policy will continue for the remaining death benefit.
4. **Not an Additional Benefit**: The acceleration of the death benefit is not an additional benefit; it merely facilitates earlier payment of the death benefit upon diagnosis of terminal illness.

other_benefits.value:
1) **Return of Premium (ROP) Option**: If this option is chosen, the policyholder will have to pay an additional premium over and above the basic premium. This option ensures that the total premiums paid are returned at maturity if selected.

2) **Terminal Illness Benefit**: In case of diagnosis of terminal illness during the policy term, the Sum Assured on Death, up to a maximum of ₹2 Cr., will be accelerated.

3) **Tax Benefits**: Premiums paid and benefits received may be eligible for tax benefits under the applicable sections of the Income Tax Act, 1961. It is advised to consult a tax advisor for specific guidance.

4) **Option to Alter Premium Frequency**: The policyholder has the option to alter the premium frequency during the premium payment term.

5) **Option to Change Premium Payment Term**: The policyholder can convert the outstanding regular premiums into a limited pay option.

surrender_benefits.value: Surrender benefits for the HDFC Life Click 2 Protect Ultimate policy are as follows: 1. **Surrender Value**: The surrender value will be the higher of **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)** and **Special Surrender Value (SSV)**. 2. **Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV)**: Calculated as **GSV Factor% × Total Premiums Paid**. 3. **Special Surrender Value (SSV)**: Calculated as the expected present value of: i) Paid-up guaranteed future benefits on death, survival/maturity and ii) Equal to the discounted value of all future instalments due. The interest rate used for the discounted value will be applicable on the date of termination. 4. **No additional premium** is payable for the surrender benefits.

   - Can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25, but not during the last 5 policy years.
   - The policy must be in-force at the time of exercising this option.

2. **Option to Alter Premium Frequency**: The policyholder can alter the premium frequency during the premium payment term.

   - Total Premiums Paid will include premiums paid only from the date of converting to Limited Pay.
   - **Unexpired Policy Term** will be calculated on the earlier of the date of surrender and the date till which premiums have been paid.
